
---
title: '小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13_12 系列设计，199 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/ab5d21ef-5462-4c80-b287-c59bfe4bfcf2.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Tue, 13 Sep 2022 03:20:34 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/ab5d21ef-5462-4c80-b287-c59bfe4bfcf2.png'
---

<div>   
<div class="tougao-user">感谢IT之家网友 <a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1790356" rel="nofollow">很宅很怕生</a> 的线索投递！</div>
            <p data-vmark="9276"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 9 月 13 日消息，小米推出了一款磁吸无线充电宝，把磁吸充电宝和立式无线充结合了起来，<span class="accentTextColor">专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，售价 199 元</span>。</p><p data-vmark="eff3" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/ab5d21ef-5462-4c80-b287-c59bfe4bfcf2.png" w="745" h="619" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" width="745" height="619" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="4372">据介绍，小米磁吸无线充电宝支持两种形态，出行使用时，是磁吸无线充电宝；桌面使用时，轻轻一放秒变立式无线充电器。</p><p data-vmark="11b5" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/c90843fe-9cc5-4ac8-b7f9-53825868b9e4.png" w="757" h="690" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" width="757" height="690" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7c41" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/43a2c207-e30e-467d-a998-da4f47027e4b.png" w="762" h="768" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" width="762" height="768" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="1b9d">上方的充电宝部分支持边冲边放，自充电时也能为手机充电。</p><p data-vmark="13bd" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/be19ad11-3cab-4508-8e76-4aa884460a28.png" w="769" h="653" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" width="769" height="653" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="2194">小米磁吸无线充电宝专为 iPhone13/12 系列用户打造，<span class="accentTextColor">厚度为 12mm</span>，支持磁吸无线充电功能，无需按键自动充电。10N 磁吸力（1kg），带壳照样充。</p><p data-vmark="f71c" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/adae7926-4289-40e3-9b3e-48b89aece5ed.png" w="816" h="582" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" width="816" height="582" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="9c03">小米磁吸无线充电宝容量为 <span class="accentTextColor">5000mAh</span>，支持 Type-C 双向充电，最高 20W 输入，<span class="accentTextColor">12W 输出</span>，还有金属异物检测等安全功能。</p><p data-vmark="d749" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/78d3ed8e-4808-4dcd-82ad-2daebf1c9119.png" w="864" h="498" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" width="864" height="473" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7c97" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/9/e763c312-dd44-4be9-8150-ea6a72036f02.png" w="611" h="759" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" width="611" height="759" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="e9b5">IT之家了解到，小米磁吸无线充电宝已开启预约，售价 199 元，将于 9 月 16 日正式开售。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100037719545"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/172263/37/24367/13310/6315b230Ed6de85e0/a22f65551135efcb.jpg" title="小米磁吸无线充电宝开启预约：专为 iPhone 13/12 系列设计，199 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">小米磁吸无线充电宝 大容量 立式无线充 Type-c 双向充电</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 199 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
